Package org.risk.model.battle

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AttackingStateBattleArmyBuilder
    The instance of this Class is used to generate attacking state army
    BattleArmy
    The instance of this Class will be used to modify number of armies during the battle
    BattleArmyBuilder
    This is the abstract class for Builder pattern
    BattleGround
    The instance of this class creates the battle and in builder pattern it acts as a director
    BattleGroundTest
    Test class for testing Battle Ground
    MultipleBattleFronts
    The instance of this Class is used to apply multiple battles
    TargetStateBattleArmyBuilder
    The instance of ths class represent target state army builder
